str2: No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Singular
str2: How much, how great, how many, as great as, as much. By reduplication from hos; as As.
Apart from, separately from; without. Adverb from chora; at a space, i.e. Separately or apart from.
The taking of an oath, an oath. From a compound of horkos and a derivative of omnuo; asseveration on oath.
For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: A prolongation and middle voice form of a primary verb; to cause to be, i.e. to become, used with great latitude.
A priest, one who offers sacrifice to a god (in Jewish and pagan religions; of Christians only met.). From hieros; a priest.
Apart from, separately from; without. Adverb from chora; at a space, i.e. Separately or apart from.
The taking of an oath, an oath. From a compound of horkos and a derivative of omnuo; asseveration on oath.
